text: فَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ شَقُواْ فَفِي ٱلنَّارِ لَهُمۡ فِيهَا زَفِيرٞ وَشَهِيقٌ

translation.en: As for those who were [destined to be] wretched, they will be in the Fire. For them therein is [violent] exhaling and inhaling
translation.id: Maka adapun orang-orang yang sengsara, maka (tempatnya) di dalam neraka, di sana mereka mengeluarkan dan menarik nafas dengan merintih
